txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken wood spears from the intelligent creatures of the Lone-lands. Bring the spears to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth.
'These will be used to show that there is hope, even in these dark times.\n\n'Thank you.'
'Our enemies are many, friend. I would ask a task of you to claim the weapons from the intelligent ones that I may show my people hope.'
Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth desires the broken wood spears from the intelligent creatures making the Lone-lands their home.
Deliver the broken wood spears to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth
You accepted a task from Frideric the Elder to acquire broken wood spears from the intelligent creatures in the Lone-lands. You can find Frideric the Elder within Ost Guruth.
Wanted: Broken wood spears from the intelligent creatures of the Lone-lands.
